body_content.explanation: a line where two things join, especially a line of sewing joining two pieces of cloth or leather:
examples: The bags we sell have very strong seams, so they will last for years.
My old coat is coming/falling apart at the seams (= the stitches are coming out).
Their marriage is coming/falling apart at the seams (= likely to fail).

body_content.explanation: a long, thin layer of a substance such as coal that has formed between layers of other rocks
